title: yashOdA bAlA
sahitya:
rAgA: hEmavati   
   yashOdhA bAlA lIlA vinOdA yadu tilakA engaLayAL nanda
 


caraNam 1    nAn maraigaLait-tAngum nAngu kaigaLoDu Uzhi Azhi tanil mInAruvanAi
ANma kODi azhiyAmal mudukilE bhUmi tAngum Adi kUrmamAnAi
  caraNam 2   			rAgA: tODi Aa:S R1 G2 M1 P D1 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D1 P M1 G2 R1 S  kaDal pughundu hiraNyAkSan uDal piLandu puDaviyai mITTezhum varAha mUrti
ANava hiraNyan azhiya prahlAdanukkAi thUNil avataritta narasimha mUrti
  caraNam 3   			rAgA: nATakuranjiAa:S R2 G3 M1 N2 D2 N2 P D2 N2 S  Av:  S N2 D2 M1 G3 M1 P M1 G3 R2 S  mUvaDi maN vENDi IraDiyAl aLandu maTrOraDi mAbali muDi vaitta vAmanA
bhU maghaL tan bhAram tIra arashar kulap-pUNDatta parashu rAmAvatArA
 
 caraNam 4    kAma piNDamAi lOka khaNDakanAna dushta irAvaNanai vadaitta rAmAvatArA
kAma bAlanAi kaiyil kalappai ulakkai Ettum yaduvIra balarAmanE
 
 caraNam 5    uyir vadai sakhiyAda karuNai vaDivAi vanda uttamanE satvaguNa buddha mUrti
yugamuDivil uDai vALEndi puravimEl ulagai valam vanda kalki avatArA
